metadata.title: CVE-2017-17816 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a use-after-free inpp_getline in asm/preproc.c that will cause a remote denial of serviceattack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1').
